about.title: Dedicated to Excellence in Islamic Education
about.text1: The Suffah Education is a religious and educational institution established to promote Islamic teachings in the light of the Qur'an and Sunnah. Its purpose is to awaken Islamic awareness among children, youth, and adults of the Muslim Ummah, to spread the understanding of the Holy Qur'an, and to present Islamic knowledge in a modern and accessible way.
about.text2: The Suffah Education is also an online platform created to spread Islamic knowledge to every corner of the world. Here, qualified scholars (Ulama) conduct live classes that include the teaching of Qur'an with Tajweed, Noorani Qaida, Hadith, Seerah of Prophet Muhammad ﷺ, lives of Sahabah, and Islamic history.
about.text3: Our mission is to nurture individuals who are righteous in character, sincere in faith, and active in spreading the message of Islam through both knowledge and practice.
about.urduText1: الصفہ ایک دینی و تعلیمی ادارہ ہے جو قرآن و سنت کی روشنی میں اسلامی تعلیمات کے فروغ کے لیے قائم کیا گیا ہے۔ اس کا مقصد امت مسلمہ کے بچوں، نوجوانوں اور بڑوں میں دینی شعور بیدار کرنا، قرآن مجید کی تعلیم و تفہیم عام کرنا، اور اسلامی علوم کو جدید انداز میں پیش کرنا ہے۔
about.urduText2: الصفہ ایک آن لائن پلیٹ فارم بھی ہے جو دنیا کے ہر کونے میں اسلامی علم کو عام کرنے کے لیے بنایا گیا ہے۔ یہاں علماء کرام براہ راست کلاسز لیتے ہیں جن میں قرآن مجید مع تجوید، نورانی قاعدہ، حدیث، سیرت النبی ﷺ، صحابہ کرام رضی اللہ عنہم کی زندگیاں اور اسلامی تاریخ کی تعلیم دی جاتی ہے۔

student1.name: Abdullah Khan
student1.text: The teachers are incredibly patient and knowledgeable. I've learned so much in just a few months.

student2.name: Fatima Ahmed
student2.text: My children love their Quran classes. The interactive approach keeps them engaged and motivated.

student3.name: Usman Ali
student3.text: Completing my Hifz here was a life-changing experience. The support system is amazing.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Learn about our journey, our mission, and the values that drive us forward.
aboutPage.missionText: To provide high-quality Islamic education that is accessible to everyone, regardless of their location or background. We aim to foster a deep understanding of the Quran and Sunnah, empowering individuals to live their lives according to Islamic principles.
aboutPage.visionText: To be a leading global institution for Islamic learning, recognized for our commitment to excellence, innovation, and the spiritual growth of our students. We envision a world where the light of the Quran reaches every home and heart.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to us for any questions or inquiries.
